entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023
